name: Sasquatch Startler
description:
In "Sasquatch Startler", you take on the role of a Sasquatch. Reclusive by nature, Sasquatches can't help but leave clues to their existence, yet they love startling those who investigate.

Startle people by getting near them using a a controller, keyboard or mouse. Beware though - get too close to someone, and you might just get startled yourself!
